apps.title: VBot - Multi-Feature AI Hotline
apps.description: VBot is an intelligent AI hotline solution that helps businesses automate customer care, optimize communication processes, and enhance user experience. With advanced AI technology, VBot can handle calls, respond to messages, and support customers 24/7.

Supports multiple channels: voice, SMS, chatbot, integrates with CRM

Flexible SDK, easy to integrate into business applications and systems

apps.title: VScan - Document Scanning Application
apps.description: VScan is a powerful document scanning application that helps you convert paper documents, contracts, invoices, and many other types of documents into digital format quickly and accurately. With advanced Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology, VScan helps you store, search, and share documents easily.
apps.titles: With VScan, you can conveniently digitize documents, save time, and improve work efficiency.

apps.title: Electronic Office
apps.description: VOffice is an electronic office solution that helps businesses digitalize workflows, manage documents, oversee tasks, and optimize work efficiency. apps.titles: With VOffice, businesses can modernize their work model, save time, and boost productivity.

apps.title: Golden Health
apps.description: Golden Health is a personal health care application that helps users effectively monitor and manage their health. With smart features, Golden Health supports users in tracking heart rate, blood pressure, weight, and other important health indicators.
features: Track heart rate, blood pressure, weight, and other key health indicators
Record health logs and treatment progress
Remind users to take medications, schedule doctor visits, and exercise
Analyze health and suggest ways to improve physical condition
apps.titles: With Golden Health, you can proactively care for your health, build a healthy lifestyle, and prevent disease risks.
